definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: id. (formed unusually from the ptcp., an Aram. formation, cf. Ba:NB 414 f.) [[תְּהִּלַּת דִּבְּרֵי־פִיהוּ סִכְלוּת וְאַחֲרִית פִּיהוּ הוֹלֵלוּת רָעָה]] Ec 10:13 the beginning of the words of his mouth is folly, and the end of his mouth (his speech) is evil madness.
